snippet: Alcoa reported a surprise quarterly profit, easing concerns about a possible weak earnings season.
abstract: Encouraging start to earnings season boosts stocks, helping them rebound from five days of losses.
lead_paragraph: Alcoa reported a surprise quarterly profit, easing concerns about a possible weak earnings season.

headline.main: Strong Earnings Help Shares Rise After 5 Days of Losses
headline.print_headline: Strong Earnings Help Shares Rise After 5 Days of Losses
